bill_title: revise the requirements for delivery of certificate of title involving a used vehicle.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the requirements for delivery of certificate of title involving a used vehicle. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 32-3-7 be amended to read as follows: 32-3-7. Every Each person, firm, or corporation, upon the sale and delivery of any used or secondhand motor vehicle and after the purchaser has paid or agreed to financing with the seller , shall within thirty days thereof deliver to the purchaser a certificate of title, endorsed according to law, and issued for the vehicle by the department. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
